modName: Snowflake the arctic fox custom animal follower
summary: Snowflake- An arctic fox animal follower.
descriptionHtml:
Snowflake is an arctic fox animal follower. She is built for combat and to be the silent sweet killer in your party.

She is essential and lvls with you. 

Speed increase 25% so he doesn\'t get left behind.

Located in Riverwood next to the sawmill. 

She is a standalone follower mod.

This is a working BETA and direct support is not available. 

IMPORTANT!!:
She does have one dialog glitch that I am not able to correct on my own. If you are able to fix this, please let me know.

To get her to follow you, you must:
Go up to her and press E to start dialog. 
Select the option to have her wait. (Stay here, don\'t wander off.)
Then reinitialize the dialog and select the option to have her follow you. (Please come with me and I will give you a cookie.)
She will then follow you to oblivion and back, unless you dismiss her. Lol

Check out my other mods:
Kenzie Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24821
Spot Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24796
Faren Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24754
Conrad Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24755
author: Faren Russell
